/home/derek/dev/crml/crml/tools/hexdecode.py

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #! /usr/bin/env python
00002 import sys
00003 
00004 hexes = dict(zip("0123456789abcdef", range(16)))
00005 
00006 def hexof(a, b):
00007     '''
00008     take a, b | a and b are strings [1..9] + [a..f]
00009     a == 2^16, b == 1^16
00010     '''
00011     vala = 16 * hexes[a] 
00012     valb = hexes[b]
00013     return vala+valb
00014 
00015 def quit():
00016     sys.stderr.write("Bad Data\n")
00017     sys.exit()
00018 
00019 
00020 for line in sys.stdin:    
00021     if len(line) % 2 != 0:
00022         quit()
00023     for i in xrange(len(line)/2):
00024         a, b = line[i*2], line[i*2+1]        
00025         if a not in "01234567890abcdef":
00026             quit()
00027         if b not in "01234567890abcdef":
00028             quit()
00029         sys.stdout.write(chr(hexof(a,b)))
00030
